English:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 stack of Calculation Power and deal 30% damage to all enemies.
Whenever you kill an enemy using anything other than Reflection, permanently gain 1 Attack and reduce Max HP by 1.
Chinese:
回合开始时，获得一层计算力，并对所有敌人造成30%倍率的伤害。
每当使用除反射外击杀一名敌人永久获得1点攻击力,永久减少1点最大生命值

English: When using a skill, additionally take damage equal to 3 times your Attack.
Chinese: 使用技能时，额外受到3倍于自身攻击力的伤害

English:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 stack of Calculation Power.
Each time Reflection is activated, permanently increase Max HP by 1 and Overheal all allies by 3.
When Black Wings is active, this buff disappears.
Chinese:
回合开始时，获得一层计算力
每发动一次反射，永久提高1点最大生命值，超额恢复全体友军3点生命值
当自身存在黑翼时，该buff消失。

English: When activating Reflection, extend all enemy debuffs by 1 turn and extend all ally buffs by 1 turn.
Chinese: 发动反射时使所以敌人减益延长一回合，使我方所有增益延长一回合

English: During this cycle, increase Reflection damage by the number of non-Reflection kills during this buff's duration.
Chinese: 本次循环中，将每次反射的伤害提高本buff持续期间除反射外击杀数

English: No need to apologize. I'm already invincible on my own.
Chinese: 不好意思，我一个人就已经是无敌的了

English:
At the start of battle, gain 2 stacks of Calculation Power.
Whenever attacked, consume 1 stack of "Calculation Power" to nullify the damage and activate Reflection.
Reflection: Deals 130% of Accelerator's Attack to the attacker.
Chinese:
战斗开始时获得2层计算力
每当受到攻击时，会消耗一层“计算力“，将此次伤害变为0，并发动反射
反射：对施加者造成一方通行130%攻击力

English: Accelerator is the 1st-ranked Level 5 and the strongest esper currently residing in Academy City.
Chinese: 曾经生活在学园都市，本名不详，性别不明。通常以其超能力的名称「一方通行Accelerator」作为称呼

English: Gender? Did I ever mention that?
[B] White wings... a power of protection?
[B] I sense a dark power within you...
Chinese: [B]我能感觉到，你身上暗黑的力量...

English: [A] Dark? I have another type of wing too, you know.
Chinese: [A]暗黑？我可还有另外一种翅膀哦。

English: [B] Haha, I like your combat style.
[B] You reject healing and reflect it back?
Chinese: [B]不治疗就算了，怎么还反射回来

English: [A] Do I look injured to you?
[A] Kid, are you the strongest here?
[B] My armor feels meaningless against you...
Chinese: [B]在你面前，感觉我的护甲就像...诶

English: [B] Your pale skin and hair... from constant reflection?
Chinese: [B]你的皮肤身体颜色，是长期反射的结果吗？
[B]团队配合再战斗中也是很重要的。

English: [A] Sorry, but even all of you together can't match me. Hah.
Chinese: [A]抱歉啊，你们一起上也不如我吧？哈哈。

English: [A] No need to interact with you all.
[B] Your fighting style is so brutal...
[B] You even reflect mind reading? Impressive.
Chinese: [B]连读心术也能反射吗，超乎意料啊。

English: [B] Dumb bird?! I'm a phoenix! A PHOENIX!
Chinese: [B]说我笨鸟？本大人是的凤凰！凤凰好吗！

English: [A] A mage using weapons directly. Typical, same everywhere.
Chinese: [A]直接用武器的魔法师，哈哈，果然哪里都一样。

English: [B] What do you mean by that?
[A] Not like I'm using them against you.
[B] Wow, you're strong! You go ahead, I'll rest.
Chinese: [B]哇，你好强，你上吧，我就先休息了。

English: [A] Don't need support. I'm enough alone.
Chinese: [A]不需要你的支援，我一个人就够了。

English: [B] Reflecting all attacks... even divine curses can't oppose this.
Chinese: [B]反弹一切攻击，再强大的天咒也无法抗衡吧。

English: [A] My power goes far beyond mere reflection.
Chinese: [A]本大爷的力量，可远远不止反射这般。

English: [B] Those black wings... surpass even what I've seen before.
Chinese: [B]那对黑色的翅膀，比我见过的那个家伙还要...

English: [A] My potential isn't limited to this.
[A] What now? A dragon? Doesn't matter... all the same.
Chinese: [A]这又是哪一出，龙吗，不过某种意义上也都一样...
[B]嗯，其实也是从别的地方带来的就是了

English: [A] Your power is different from theirs. Worthy of my full strength.
Chinese: [A]你的力量和他们完全不同啊，是能让我动真格的实力。

English: [B] I won't fight you. Our target is the Shadow of Time...
Chinese: [B]我是不会和你们战斗的，我们的目标是时光之影...

English: Grants Swiftness to all skills in hand.
Chinese: 使手中所有技能获得迅速

English:
Discard all skills in hand and gain Calculation Power equal to the number of Excluded skills.
Deals 40% damage to all enemies for each skill discarded.
Chinese:
使用后弃置手中所有技能，根据放逐技能的数量获得等量计算力。
并对敌方全体造成等次的40%倍率的伤害

English: Deals 50% of Max HP as damage (10% against bosses).
Chinese: 造成50%最大生命值的伤害（对boss为10%）

English:
Can be used while incapacitated.
Removes all debuffs from self.
Chinese:
可以在无法行动时使用
解除自身所有debuff
